attributes.action: Allow beauty professionals who specialise in facial beauty services to reopen.
attributes.additional_details: You have now made it against the law for these to reopen their businesses. You are the ones that hold the power. Let our voices be heard.
attributes.background: Allow therapists, technicians, practitioners to reopen their salons, clinics and studios and allow them to start offering treatments on the face including lash & brow treatments, cosmetics/aesthetics and facials.We are highly trained in health and safety and our work spaces are immaculate & sterile.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331169
